com.github.gorbin.asne.instagram

Class InstagramSocialNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.gorbin.asne.core.SocialNetwork
      • com.github.gorbin.asne.core.OAuthSocialNetwork

  • public class InstagramSocialNetwork
extends OAuthSocialNetwork
    Class for Instagram social network integration
    Author:
    Evgeny Gorbin (gorbin.e.o@gmail.com)

      • onActivityResult

        public void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                             int resultCode,
                             android.content.Intent data)
        Overrided for Instagram support
        Overrides:
        onActivityResult in class SocialNetwork
        Parameters:
        requestCode - The integer request code originally supplied to startActivityForResult(), allowing you to identify who this result came from.
        resultCode - The integer result code returned by the child activity through its setResult().
        data - An Intent, which can return result data to the caller (various data can be attached to Intent "extras").
